description: The Irish Hammer is the perfect drink to get your St. Patrick's Day party started. This sweet and smooth shot features honey and caramel notes with slight bitter hints from the&nbsp;whiskey. It only takes a few ingredients, so it's easy to make this&nbsp;cocktail for your next gathering.
